title: HoP 361 - The Measure of All Things - Renaissance Mathematics and Art
itunes:title: HoP 361 - The Measure of All Things - Renaissance Mathematics and Art
description: The humanist study of Pythagoras, Archimides and other ancient mathematicians goes hand in hand with the use of mathematics in painting and architecture.
